# North Star Astro - AI-Powered Astrology

> The only astrology platform combining Western astrology, Vedic astrology (Jyotish), and Numerology for comprehensive insights.

## About
North Star Astro provides educational content and AI-powered readings that synthesize three ancient wisdom traditions:
- Western Astrology: Psychological depth, birth charts, transits
- Vedic Astrology: Nakshatras, Dashas, Sade Sati, karmic patterns
- Numerology: Life Path numbers, Personal Years, Expression numbers

## Key Resources

- How to Read Your Birth Chart: /blog/how-to-read-your-birth-chart

- Rising Sign Explained: /blog/rising-sign-explained
- Saturn Return Guide: /blog/saturn-return-meaning
- Mercury Retrograde: /blog/mercury-retrograde-explained

### Vedic Astrology
- Vedic Astrology Hub: /vedic-astrology
- Sade Sati Explained: /blog/sade-sati-meaning

- Nakshatras Guide: /blog/nakshatras-explained

### Numerology
- Numerology Hub: /numerology
